column3: The request was granted, but not until another form had been completed and signed. Dexter Hutchins put a collect call through to the Director of the CIA at 2:27 that morning.
The hands of all the four thousand electric clocks in all the Bloomsbury Centre's four thousand rooms marked twenty-seven minutes past two.
The moon didn’t shine again until 2.27 am. It was enough to show Wallander that he was positioned some distance below the tree.
